articles.title: China dominates Covid-19 diplomacy in Africa - economic report - News24
articles.description: China has won the Covid-19 vaccine diplomacy war in Africa and the rest of the developing world ahead of Russia, India and the West because the Asian giant supplies the majority of vaccines to African countries, according to a report by the Economist's intell…
articles.content:
• China's international Covid-19 vaccine programme is a form of aid to cement diplomatic ties with recipients, a new report claims.
  • 50% of global vaccine exports are from China.
